comments: The answer thoroughly covers proactive transparency through consistent, open communication with all stakeholders. It highlights modeling ethical behavior and accountability at leadership levels, fostering a safe environment for employee feedback, and managing communication effectively during challenges. These points demonstrate strong leadership qualities in promoting transparency and accountability, warranting above-average scores in all dimensions.
